existing_features.title: Add a new UI box above the existing "Call History" panel that displays the most recent/last drawn Tambola number, updating whenever a new number is drawn.

Wire the last/most recent drawn number into the History section by passing the needed state from the main game hook into the History UI (e.g., use gameState.lastDrawn and gameState.isComplete), reusing the existing LastNumberDisplay component where appropriate.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a box above Call History to display the most recent/last draw number

projectName: Add a recent/last draw number box above Call History
